binary.inp: TEXT [TEXT] - The stuff to convert to/from binary
binary.desc: Converts binary to text, and text to binary

mock.inp:
MESSAGE [MESSAGE] - The message you want me to mock, ID or URL
> Will use the latest message in chat if not specified

quad.inp: A, B, C [NUMBER] - Corrosponds to "Ax^2 + Bx + C"

draw.inp:
COLOR  [TEXT] - The color you want to place, MUST BE HEX
xN, yN [ANY ] - The XY coordinates [MAX - 127, MIN - 0]
> You can use ranges like 0-16
> You can be relative like ~1
> You can use relative ranges like ~9-26
*If no params are passed, the image is sent
*If only coordinates are passed, the color at that coordinate is sent along with the image
*ALL relative points are relative to YOUR last point

hug.inp:
MEMBER [MEMBER] - The Member you want to hug, name or ping or ID
REASON [TEXT  ] - The reason for the hug

chnl.inp: CHANNEL [CHANNEL] - The target channel, name or ping or ID

vox.inp: TEXT [TEXT] - The text I should phoentically spell

bug.inp: TXT [STR] - The bug, preferably with the error and command

rto.inp:
X [NUMBER] - The first number, or numerator
Y [NUMBER] - The second number, or denominator

kiss.inp:
MEMBER [MEMBER] - The member you want to kiss, name or ping or ID
REASON [TEXT  ] - The reason for the kiss

char.inp:
CHARS [TEXT] - The characters you want data on
> If you want info on one character, you can see how to write it in various programming languages

ti.inp: MSG [MESSAGE] - The target message, ID or URL

roles.inp:
MEMBER [MEMBER] - The target user, mention or name or ID
ROLE   [ROLE  ] - The target role, mention or name or ID
REASON [TEXT  ] - The reason for the action DEFAULT: "REQUESTED BY ] <name>"
*All roles given will toggle the role presence on ALL members given
roles.desc: Adds or removes {role} from {user} for a {reason}

bf.inp:
L    [NUMBER] - How large the RAM should be, 16 bytes by default
CODE [TEXT  ] - The PrizFuck code to execute
INP  [TEXT  ] - The input text
*Type ';]bf help' to learn the new tokens

hexadecimal.inp: TEXT [TEXT] - The stuff to convert to/from hex
hexadecimal.desc: Converts hex to text, and text to hex

graph.inp:
WINDOW [NUMBERS] - Set XMIN, XMAX, YMIN, YMAX in that order
EQx    [TEXT   ] - The equation to graph
OPS    [TEXT   ] - Other arguments
> This list is long, use ';]graph help' for more
*Use '>=' and '<=' for 'at least' and 'at most' graphs [respectively]
*XY equations like `x^2+y^2` MUST have an equal sign

cuddle.inp:
MEMBER [MEMBER] - The member you want to cuddle, name or ping or ID
REASON [TEXT  ] - The reason for the cuddle

reddit.inp:
SUBREDDIT [TEXT] - The name of the subredditm /r/ is optional
> /u/ is required to redditor feeds
> also can be a link to a submission
> /m/<multireddit>#<redditor> is needed for multireddits
> > eg /m/CoolMultireddit#Redditor1010
SEARCH    [TEXT] - What to search for
reddit.desc: Gives you a random post from a given {subreddit}

mi.inp: MBR [MEMBER] - The target member, ID or ping or name

emj.inp: EMOJI [EMOJI] - The CUSTOM emoji in question

text.desc: You can have a conversation with me!

learn.inp: TEXT [TEXT] - Preset conversation, each message on new line

md.inp: MESSAGE [MESSAGE] - The target message, ID or URL

throw.inp:
MEMBER [MEMBER] - The member you want to throw, name or ping or ID
REASON [TEXT  ] - The reason for the throw

coin.inp: COUNT [NUMBER] - How many times the coin should be flipped

ball8.inp: QUESTION [TEXT] What do you want me to answer

kick.inp:
MEMBERx [MEMBER] - The target member[s], name or ping or ID
REASON  [TEXT  ] - The reason for the ban

convert.inp: FMT [TEXT] - The format to convert *to* eg "pdf"
convert.desc: Converts a file to a {fmt} file!
convert.use: ;]convert {fmt} <attach a file or have an embedable link>

clrto.inp: MESSAGE [MESSAGE] - The message to clear to, ID or URL
clrto.desc: Clears all messages to a given {message} [exclusively]

dnd.desc: Rolls all the dice from DnD

hlepmod.desc: Brings up the mod help message

spam.inp: NUM [NUMBER] - How many chars to spam

nick.inp:
MEMBER   [MEMBER] - The target member, name or ping or ID
NICKNAME [TEXT  ] - The nickname
nick.desc: Changes the nickname of a {member} to {this}

mines.inp:
SIZE  [NUMBER] - X by X tiles
MINES [NUMBER] - How many mines

asci.desc: Just prints one of these cool ASCIImoji!

pin.inp: MESSAGE [MESSAGE] - The message you wish to pin, ID or URL
pin.desc: Pins a message for you, useful on mobile

substitute.inp:
NUM [NUMBER] - The thing X is equal to
EQ  [TEXT  ] - The equation to solve
substitute.desc: Substitutes a number in for X

snd.inp:
CHANNEL [CHANNEL] - The channel you want the message in, name or ping or ID
TEXT    [TEXT   ] - The text to send

ri.inp: ROLE [ROLE] - The target role, ping or name or ID

unpin.inp: MESSAGE [MESSAGE] - The message you wish to unpin, ID or URL
unpin.desc: Pins a message for you, useful on mobile

stats.inp: DATAx [NUMBER] - A number or a statistic

hlep.inp: COM [COMMAND NAME] - OPTIONAL: Brings up a help message for that specific command

inv.desc: Invite for me and my support server

cool.inp: MEMBER [MEMBER] - The member you want to surprise, ping or name or ID

captcha.inp: MEMBER [MEMBER] - The member to test, they may fail

mix.inp:
ACTION [TEXT] - [slot1, slot2, imgs, view, slots, kill]
> slot1 - Load an attached image into the "image" file
> slot2 - Load an attached image into the "pattern" file
> imgs  - View currently loaded images
> view  - View the status of the current mix
> slots - Start the mixing
> kill  - Kills the current process if you started it
ARGS   [TEXT] - [-iter=, -np]
> -iter= - Set the number of iterations [max 120, min 5]
>    -np - Do not ping when finished

play.inp:
LINK [TEXT] - Link to some file, youtube video, or is a youtube search
> YOUTUBE SEARCH---
> > Syntax ] ";]play {vc} yt-{search}"
> > Add "-i={video number}" to get that result playing
VC   [VC  ] - The VC I should join, name or ID

enbl.inp: COMMAND [TEXT] - The name of the command you want to enable

code.inp:
LANG [STR] - The language to use
> 'js' for JavaScript
> 'py' for Python
> 'tr' for Boolean Logic
CODE [STR] - The code to execute
code.desc: A public exec command to test your code!

dsbl.inp: COMMAND [TEXT] - The name of the command you want to disable

emji.inp: EMOJIx [EMOJI] - The emoji you want to steal, must be custom

factor.inp: NUM [NUMBER] - The number to find the factors of
factor.desc: Finds the factors and prime factors of {num}

ban.inp:
MEMBERx [MEMBER] - The target member[s], name or ping or ID
NUM     [NUMBER] - Delete messages from the past {x} days
REASON  [TEXT  ] - The reason for the ban
ban.desc: Bans {member} for {reason} and deletes their messages from the past {x} days

rng.inp:
MIN   [NUMBER] - Minimum number
MAX   [NUMBER] - Maximum number
COUNT [NUMBER] - Number of numbers

react.inp:
MESSAGE   [MESSAGE] - The message, URL or ID
REACTIONS [ANY    ] - The reaction[s], can be letters, custom, or default

slap.inp:
MEMBER [MEMBER] - The member you want to slap, name or ping or ID
REASON [STR   ] - The reason for the slap

ui.inp: USR [MEMBER] - The member you want info on

clr.inp: NUM [NUMBER] - The number of messages to clear

tag.inp:
ACTION [TEXT] - The action you want to take
> Use the tag name to view the tag
> Use ';]edit {name} {content}' to edit your tag
> Use ';]add {name} {content}' to create a tag
> Use ';]delete {name}' to delete your tag
NAME   [TEXT] - Only used when adding or editing a tag
DATA   [TEXT] - The content when adding or editing a tag

find.inp: fID [STR] - The name or ID of the thing to find
find.desc: Finds a meta object given an ID or name

rad.inp:
D [INT] - Discriminator, aka X√>>D<<
X [INT] - The radical, aka "square root" is 2 and "cube root" is 3

clrin.inp: MESSAGEx [MESSAGE] - The messages to clear between, ID or URL
clrin.desc: Clears messages from {message1} to {message2} in chat [exclusively]
